#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int x,y,rem1,rem2,carry,count,c=0;
    cin>>x>>y;
  while(x!=0||y!=0)
{
    count=0;
   carry=0;
   c=0;
   rem1=0;
   rem2=0;
while(x>0&&y>0)
{
    rem1=x%10;
    rem2=y%10;
   c=rem1+rem2+carry;
   if(c>9)
  {
   count++;
   carry=1;
  }
  x=x/10;
  y=y/10;
  c=0;
}
if(count==1)
printf("%d carry operation.\n",count);
else if(count!=0)
printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
else if(count==0)
printf("No carry operation.\n");
scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
}
return 0;
}
